categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Lankost was a male Kaleesh Jedi Master of the Jedi Order during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire. He fought as one of the commanders of the Galactic Republic's forces during the Korriban Incursion, and was slain by Imperial forces during their reclamation of the Sith Academy on Korriban.

Lankost appears as one of the four Jedi Masters that must be killed in the Sith Academy during the Imperial version of the "Korriban Incursion" Flashpoint, which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.7.
